metadata.title: CVE-2024-42150 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: txgbe: remove separate irq request for MSI and INTxWhen using MSI or INTx interrupts, request_irq() for pdev->irq willconflict with request_threaded_irq() for txgbe->misc.irq, to causesystem crash. So remove txgbe_request_irq() for MSI/INTx case, andrename txgbe_request_msix_irqs() since it only request for queue irqs.Add wx->misc_irq_domain to determine whether the driver creates an IRQdomain and threaded request the IRQs.
